title: (08002) Barcelona - 6 Carrer de Josep Anselm Clavé
title_short: (08002) Barcelona - 6 Carrer de Josep Anselm Clavé
description: Nice car park close to the Rambla.

title: (08039) Barcelona - Passeig d'Itaca
description: Parking Indigo - C.C. Maremàgnum: The perfect spot to safely park your van for a fair price in Barcelona. In this mall you have everything you're looking for. Stopped by to have a nice picknick at the port and for a walk trough the busy streets in the evening. My van (2.1m height, 5.3m length) fits in there easily. Maybe bigger vehicles could fit as well. Otherwise there is a quite safe spot to park your car/autobus up the street.

title: (08003) Barcelona - s/n Avinguda del Marquès de l'Argentera
title_short: (08003) Barcelona - s/n Avinguda del Marquès de l'Argentera
description: Parking for train station. Open 24/7. Good option to park vehicles higher than 2m

address.street: s/n Avinguda del Marquès de l'Argentera

title: (08039) Barcelona - S/N Moll de Barcelona
description: Secure parking with cameras and surveillance near the beginning of La Rambla. We leave the car from 8 to 10 hours, about 30 euros, no problem.

title: (08004) Barcelona - 63 Carrer de Vila i Vilà
title_short: (08004) Barcelona - 63 Carrer de Vila i Vilà
description: Promoparc Vila i Vilà 61 is a car park with 24-hour video surveillance. At night, the gate is lowered, you can only enter with your parking ticket. The official maximum entry height is 2.1m (but I assume it's 2.2m), there are two levels, the upper level being a kind of hall where high roof vans could unfold. There are free toilets that can be opened with the parking ticket. Spent two quiet but fairly warm nights here - a perfect location for sightseeing. Price if you book online (just google promoparc).

title: (08038) Barcelona - 42 Carretera de Miramar
description: Parkplatz für max. 2 Stunden. Aussicht über Barcelona. Abfahrt der Seilbahn

title: (08003) Barcelona - 16 Passeig de Circumvaŀlació
description: Green parking zone in Spain. ideal for visiting Barcelona Zoo. a bit noisy from the trains on the other side of the street. security level is better not to leave things of value.

title: (08001) Barcelona - S/n Plaça de Castella
description: In the middle of the city, close to everything, paid 75€ for over 24h. Think 50€/24h.

title: (08018) Barcelona - 15 Carrer de Buenaventura Muñoz
description: Covered public car park PROMOPARC NÀPOLS 21 near the Arc de Triomphe Advance booking made on onepark.fr / for Sunday: €16 for 24 hours (caretaker not seen but monitored by video surveillance) Attention: Height announced is 2.10m but at the entrance panel at 2m (returned without worry with van WV california)

title: (08038) Barcelona - 29 Carretera de Montjuïc
description: One of the few places where you can spend the day

title: (08038) Barcelona - 37 Carretera de Montjuïc
description: Possibility to park quite easily (23 August) and free .. I do not know if it is possible to park at night. (I think so). Can be difficult for camping because it is on the heights of Barcelona, so downhill.

title: (08011) Barcelona - 25 Carrer de Casanova
description: Secure parking without height limit.

title: (08038) Barcelona - 717 Plaça de la Sardana
description: Mirador de l'Alcalde, overlooking Barcelona and the sea / port with park with grass for picnics. There is a Kiosk / Bar. There are public toilets.

title: (08015) Barcelona - 159 Carrer de Tamarit
description: Underground parking for van (height Max 2m10). Location at the top. Quiet and secure. Super clean toilet in the parking lot and very friendly caretaker. We recommend +++

title: (08015) Barcelona - 89 Carrer del Comte Borrell
description: Underground parking with tight and steep entrance/exit. Only accessible for small vans. Guarded throughout the day. Cars are parked blocking each other in so they will keep hold of your key incase they have to move it.

title: (08038) Barcelona - 9999 Plaça de Dante
description: Area with good views of the city from the heights of Montjuïc and where there is usually free parking. I recommend the Montjuic Pool Bar, where you can have a drink with SPECTACULAR views of Barcelona (from there you can see the Sagrada Familia, the Agbar Tower and other tourist monuments. I recommend bringing some binoculars). To drink something is not expensive, but for lunch or dinner I do not recommend it.

title: (08005) Barcelona - 146 Avinguda d'Icària
description: Blue zone, Max 2 hours of parking during the day, from 8 pm as long as you want. Located on a busy street with many shops and passage, you will not be mugged here.

title: (08005) Barcelona - 5 Moll de Xaloc
description: Olympic Port car park. Accessible by motorhome. Paid.

title: (08013) Barcelona - 172.B Carrer de Casp
description: Water point accessible right on the corner from the street, 100m from Basic-Fit..

title: (08038) Barcelona - 52 Carrer Doctor i Font Quer
title_short: (08038) Barcelona - 52 Carrer Doctor i Font Quer
description: Area with about 16 parking spaces around the castle of Montjuic. We spent the night very calm on a Saturday night. It is a little inclined.

title: (08038) Barcelona - 52 Carretera de Montjuïc
description:
Parking in S where we stood in February without being disturbed. No problems with burglaries or the like (but we have a PL and three dogs, which must play).
Very noisy on weekends, and certainly more restrictions in high season!
A quarter of an hour from the city on foot, and in the middle of Montjuïc Park. Outside the EPZ.

title: (08013) Barcelona - 174 Carrer de Nàpols
description: Paid parking convenient for visiting Barcelona safely. there are guards around the clock. there are toilets at the back of the garage (we asked and we were able to use them). for the height I don't know but in a van it's ok !! I would say 2m30 max.

title: (08013) Barcelona - 183 Carrer de Nàpols
description: Amazing bar accompanied with a proper laundry service. The washing and drying works with tokens so you don’t have to bother with coins which is a huge extra.

title: (08018) Barcelona - 101 Carrer de Pamplona
description: Great place to Ad water in your van !

title: (08005) Barcelona - 100 Carrer del Doctor Trueta
description: Secure street parking without services. Near everything...

title: (08015) Barcelona - 107 Carrer de Calàbria
description: Access without height or length limit. We arrived with a van a roof tent a bike rack (4 bikes) hitched to the van and we were able to leave everything safe. Parked from 5:30 p.m. to 10 a.m. the next day. The Rocafort metro is next door! The guards are friendly and accommodating. They offer us to keep the keys of the vehicle to move it if necessary. Good address to remember in Barcelona.

title: (08018) Barcelona - 118 Carrer de Pamplona
description: Fuente con agua. Fácil parar.

title: (08036) Barcelona - 176 Carrer de Paris
description: Parking garage for tall vehicles

title: (08038) Barcelona - 38 Carrer l'Estadi
description:
Free overnight parking by the roadside for 300 meters. 
Toilets nearby (daytime only) and found free wifi 20 meters from road.
300 meters from metro.

the best free roadside parking for campers in the CENTER  of Barcelona!

...but remember it's only roadside parking.

title: (08005) Barcelona - 16.B Passatge d'Aymà
description: LLACUNA CAR PARKING. Parking for hours/days. It closes at 9:00 p.m. but you can leave the van parked overnight, it's a good car park, high ceilings, ideal for motorhomes and tall vans. The area is ideal for exploring Barcelona and leaving the van safe.

title: (08038) Barcelona - Unnamed Road
description: It is a perfect place to park the caravan or stop to do maintenance (I always to there work in my motor bike reparations.

title: (08018) Barcelona - 231 Carrer dels Almogàvers
description:
Automatic laundry "La Wash"
Detergent and softener included in the wash
Washing 4'5 euros
Dried 2 euros

title: (08037) Barcelona - 228 Carrer de Bailèn
description: Secured underground parking.  3.30 an hour. height 2m20. Bathroom. 20 minutes from Parc Guell. 20 minutes sagrada family. 40 minutes cathedral.

title: (08005) Barcelona - 69 Carrer de Marià Aguiló
description: Automatic laundry Sale of detergent 0.50 euros.

title: (08038) Barcelona - 10 Carrer Pierre de Coubertin
description: Parking behind the Olympic Stadium. Calm. Good view. Water. Dangerous, many people got robbed here!

title: (08038) Barcelona - 54.C Carrer del Litoral B-10
description: Parking opposite the cemetery that can accommodate about 10 vans. Large area with grass for animals but not for parking. Right next to the ferries. A bit noisy from the road)

title: (08038) Barcelona - 97.B Carrer del Foc
description: Free parking. Frequented but quiet. Great for those traveling alone and don't want an isolated place.

title: (08041) Barcelona - 71X Carrer del Mas Casanovas
description: Paid parking.

title: (08019) Barcelona - 1 Carrer de la Selva de Mar
title_short: (08019) Barcelona - 1 Carrer de la Selva de Mar
description: Simple but effective underground parking. Allow to park easily. Not very glamorous but in view of other parking (free and paid) that are not secure, those in the underground are better. However nobody in the office while everything is on. Allow 20/25 minutes by bike to see the nearest monuments.

address.street: 1 Carrer de la Selva de Mar

title: (08041) Barcelona - 114 Carrer de Trinxant
description: Secure car park. You can find them on google maps by Motorhome parking in Barcelona. When we arrived at the gates, the security guard showed us our parking space and gave us a ticket. We visited the city (8 min walk to Navas metro station) and returned in 6 hours. Worth it as all the parking and guards make you feel safe for your van/RV. 2.9m height max.

title: (08019) Barcelona - 85 Passeig de Garcia Fària
description: Green parking space. from 8 a.m. to 8 p.m. it is chargeable and 2 hours maximum, after 8 p.m. it is free. A safe place in what is Barcelona. Noisy in the morning since it is the entrance to the B10 motorway

title: (08038) Barcelona - 16 Carrer de l'Estany
description: On this street it is still free to park, on both sides

title: (08019) Barcelona - 560 Passeig Marítim de la Mar Bella
title_short: (08019) Barcelona - 560 Passeig Marítim de la Mar Bella
description:
Underground parking accessible to trucks, buses and motorhomes. You might need to book in advance which you can do online (press contact above),  we went in feb and it was quite full. 10 euro taxi to town or 15 min bike ride. Close to a beach with supervised swimming and even a space to bathe with his dog. A large shopping center 100 m. A tram line and many buses day and night to access the city center. Only downside, it is hot in the parking lot to sleep at night but it is better than having a window break on the free parking. Plan to book on the website of municipal services in Barcelona to pay less.
Be aware of length restrictions: on website is written 7 meter, in email they write 6 meter.

address.street: 560 Passeig Marítim de la Mar Bella

title: (08028) Barcelona - 65 Carrer de Carreras i Candi
title_short: (08028) Barcelona - 65 Carrer de Carreras i Candi
description: Underground parking ideal for visiting the city. near the subway (line 1)

title: (08024) Barcelona - 77 Carrer de Josep Serrano
description: Quiet and asphalt parking

title: (08027) Barcelona - 11 Baixada de la Sagrera
description: Parking in the neighborhood of Sagrera, shops and public transport nearby, during the day has a lot of activity the night is quieter, ideal to visit Barcelona

title: (08024) Barcelona - 106 Avinguda del Coll del Portell
title_short: (08024) Barcelona - 106 Avinguda del Coll del Portell
description: Great place with a great view of Tibidabo, great to spend the night in a van or van. Motorhomes are not suitable as this is a dead end street, there is no turning range.

title: (08038) Barcelona - 11 Carrer dels Alts Forns
description: Perfect place to park and visit

title: (08038) Barcelona - 23F Carrer del Foc
description: Quiet street 800 m from the subway. We left the camper here for two days and two nights. Shaded and quiet area.

title: (08902) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - 42 Carrer de l'Alhambra
title_short: (08902) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - 42 Carrer de l'Alhambra
description: Laundry

title: (08038) Barcelona - 4 Carrer d'Ascó
description: Brand new car park (not yet finished) very little use. Business district so no one in the streets at night. Very quiet street so hardly any nuisance. A second converted van was parked in front of us. So we decided to spend the night, without any worries! Neighborhood lighting all night long. Rather reassuring. Perfect. No restriction sign (during construction in our case) 13min from the beaches.

title: (08038) Barcelona - 37.B Carrer de l'Acer
description: Free parking day and night next to Fira Gran Vía North access. It is a commercial and office area. During the day it gets crowded with cars but at night there is plenty of parking space and there is a security guard hanging around the street. The noise of the cars is not excessive. We have slept three nights to visit the caravanning room and it has been a place of 10, also spacious and with little traffic, perfect for playing ball with the dog.

title: (08023) Barcelona - 7B Carrer del Portell
description: Small parking lot very quiet at night, close to a gym for the neighborhood. right next to park guell. Sloping entrance difficult access, only suitable for vans.

title: (08028) Barcelona - 643 Avinguda Diagonal
description: Close to football stadium Barcelona.

title: (08028) Barcelona - 20U Carrer d'Arístides Maillol
description: Busy car park next to sports fields, close to Camp Nou and the university. During the day many tourists, (parents of) athletes and students pass through. In the evening it gets quieter (and grittier). No parking during FC Barcelona matches.

title: (08902) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - 105 Carrer de l'Aprestadora
title_short: (08902) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - 105 Carrer de l'Aprestadora
description: Fresh Laundry Romm Laundry

title: (08028) Barcelona - 7 Carrer de Martí i Franquès
title_short: (08028) Barcelona - 7 Carrer de Martí i Franquès
description: Free parking on the street. We moved a little bit up and down the same street. Best time to get a spot was before 6am and after 10pm. There is a cctv on the nearest building (university), parks, benches and trashcans nearby. No problems for us, not really noisy. Tube is really close (top corner of the street) and it takes around 25 mins to the center.

title: (08028) Barcelona - 22 Carrer de Pau Gargallo
description: Large parking lot near the Camp Nou and the Royal Palace metro station. It seems that you can not park if there is a game.

title: (08023) Barcelona - 19 Carrer de Ticià
description: Parking along the road in the neighborhood near the hospital, free on weekends! Quiet and close to Guell Park.

title: (08022) Barcelona - 26 Carrer dels Dominics
description: Streets around the CosmoCauxa Museum: 2h max parking, free at weekends. The museum is free for children up to 16 years old and for everyone else it costs. Very interactive and varied, large park freely accessible during opening hours with toilets, drinking water and cafeteria and some experiments. Free-flying green parrots in the quarter, many by the trees at the small playground.

title: (08028) Barcelona - 8 Carrer d’Adolf Florensa
description: Small earthen car park between the buildings. Possible in motorhome

title: (08930) Sant Adrià de Besòs - 3 Carrer de la Pau
title_short: (08930) Sant Adrià de Besòs - 3 Carrer de la Pau
description: Free roadside parking. It’s not marked as a parking spot but it’s usually full of marked cars on this strip

title: (08902) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - 189 Carrer de Narcís de Monturiol
title_short: (08902) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - 189 Carrer de Narcís de Monturiol
description: Land parking behind the sports center, spacious, close to shops and all kinds of services.

title: (08035) Barcelona - 12 Carrer de Coll i Alentorn
title_short: (08035) Barcelona - 12 Carrer de Coll i Alentorn
description: Free parking on gravel field. Right next to a soccer field. Approximately 30 min walk to Park Güell. Metro station nearby. Easy access to the city. No service, only parking.

title: (08908) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - Carrer de les Ciències
title_short: (08908) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - Carrer de les Ciències
description: Street car park with small park area, ideal for day trips to Barcelona, easy access to bus stop to downtown.

title: (08035) Barcelona - 11 Carrer de Carles Riba
description: We slept here for one night in Barcelona, we don't know if it's really safe but everything was fine. A security guy also came by and asked us if everything was ok. I think it went well because in the city it is not safe to sleep in a van.

title: (08035) Barcelona - 9 Carrer de la Granja Vella
title_short: (08035) Barcelona - 9 Carrer de la Granja Vella
description: Free paved parking

title: (08035) Barcelona - 8 Carrer Juan de Ávila
description: Free parking with views of Barcelona

title: (08028) Barcelona - 8 Carrer de la Torre Melina
title_short: (08028) Barcelona - 8 Carrer de la Torre Melina
description: Wide place and near the L3 metro to go to the city center. We stayed there for 2 nights rather quiet and without problems.

title: (08908) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - 105 Carrer de les Ciències
title_short: (08908) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - 105 Carrer de les Ciències
description: Parking strips at the edge of the road - directly in front of a restaurant DIVERSUS very practical is that there is breakfast in the restaurant and you could also eat etc

title: (08906) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - 12 Avinguda de Manuel Azaña
title_short: (08906) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - 12 Avinguda de Manuel Azaña
description: Near metro L5, direct to Sagrada Familia. to sleep another close after 21:00 to find a place

title: (08020) Barcelona - 184 Passeig de la Verneda
description: Parking where you can leave the car during the day and night. There is no surveillance, a lot of sun.

title: (08017) Barcelona - 21X Carrer de Gaspar Cassadó
description: Regular car parking next to a school, free parking here. Doable for vans

title: (08034) Barcelona - 16 Carrer de Castellet
description: Parking near Pedralbes monastery

title: (08028) Barcelona - 9 Avinguda d'Albert Bastardas
description: Parking to visit the city of Barcelona and especially 10 minutes walk from Camp Nou to see a football match, stay only one night, in the morning a little too much car passage

title: (08930) Sant Adrià de Besòs - Carrer de la Pau
title_short: (08930) Sant Adrià de Besòs - Carrer de la Pau
description: Day and night parking near a park by the sea

title: (08035) Barcelona - 77X Carrer de Bellesguard
description: At the end of a dead end street lies an open piece of ground. Some old cars are parked here but otherwise there is nothing. People from nearby appartments walk their dogs or do short hikes. There’s a monastery nearby (not visited). Very quiet for a place in a big city. No water, no power. There’s place for two or three RVs. Bus stop at 100m.

title: (08930) Sant Adrià de Besòs - 67 Carrer de Balmes
title_short: (08930) Sant Adrià de Besòs - 67 Carrer de Balmes
description: Free day parking next to the metro entrance to visit the city

title: (08028) Barcelona - 695 Avinguda Diagonal
description: Large parking lot next to the diagonal. Quiet night (traffic noise). Little free in the region.

title: (08907) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - 55 Avinguda d'Europa
description: Self-service laundromat. Open Mon-Sun 7am-10pm. Very clean and modern. Detergent is included. You can pay with coins, notes and cards. Parking spaces directly in front. A little tight for large vehicles.

title: (08040) Barcelona - 62 Carrer 3
description: Free parking near the metro, about 40 minutes from the center. Calm. Trafficked by trucks. Nothing bad happened.

title: (08035) Barcelona - 20 Avinguda del Jordà
description: A good place for parking. No green zone marking. Drinking water available.  Metro 5min.

title: (08040) Barcelona - 69 Carrer 3
description: I stood here for several nights but very noisy. Metro close by!

title: (08930) San Adrián del Besós - 4172 Carrer de Dolores Ibarruri Pasionaria
title_short: (08930) San Adrián del Besós - 4172 Carrer de Dolores Ibarruri Pasionaria
description: Parking for cars and campers free night and day but with a generator in operation which is a bit of a nuisance

title: (08930) Santa Coloma de Gramenet - 14 Carrer Maragall
title_short: (08930) Santa Coloma de Gramenet - 14 Carrer Maragall
description: Fresh Laundry.

title: (08907) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - 81 Avinguda d'Amèrica
description: Free parking day and night ... attention: on Friday morning there is a market from 6 to 16 ... many bars and restaurants in the area ... quiet neighborhood and 200 m metro ... park with drinking fountain

title: (08017) Barcelona - 3 Carrer Pins de Can Caralleu
title_short: (08017) Barcelona - 3 Carrer Pins de Can Caralleu
description: Parking spaces to stay overnight. Do not climb with large caravans, there are many trails.

title: (08035) Barcelona - 301 Carretera de les Aigües
description: Mirador de Sarrià. Parking at the foot of the road in which to observe the beautiful views of the city of Barcelona, ​​above all night.

title: (08930) Sant Adrià de Besòs - s/n Carrer de Dolores Ibarruri Pasionaria
title_short: (08930) Sant Adrià de Besòs - s/n Carrer de Dolores Ibarruri Pasionaria
description: Parking lot next to the factory

address.street: s/n Carrer de Dolores Ibarruri Pasionaria

title: (08907) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - 147 Travessera Industrial
description: The OliPrix gas station, in addition to being very cheap, has a tap to fill clean water for free

title: (08930) Sant Adrià de Besòs - 531 Avinguda de la Platja
title_short: (08930) Sant Adrià de Besòs - 531 Avinguda de la Platja
description: Place to sleep and spend the day you have a public toilet in the same Alcampo train and bus station nearby to go to Barcelona to visit

title: (08035) Barcelona - 47 Camí de Vallvidrera al Tibidabo
title_short: (08035) Barcelona - 47 Camí de Vallvidrera al Tibidabo
description: Parking Tibadobo paying, easily accessible only for the visit. No other parking possible even for cars.

title: (08907) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - 55 Carrer de l'Ermita de Bellvitge
title_short: (08907) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - 55 Carrer de l'Ermita de Bellvitge
description: Parking used by cars and vans. Area of inhabited buildings, some shops, very convenient bus stop.

title: (08950) Esplugues de Llobregat - 10 Carrer Josep Anguera i Sala
title_short: (08950) Esplugues de Llobregat - 10 Carrer Josep Anguera i Sala
description: Vacant lot on the heights of Barcelona (pedralbes district) with a flat part where it is possible to sleep. it is free parking (except paying blue zone). No indication or prohibition. we stayed there for 2 days and 2 nights to visit Barcelona. It is not very pretty (some use it as a dumping ground) but there is a view over Barcelona and it is especially convenient because you can go to the city center from there by public transport. Parking is outside the low CO2 emission zone, so also convenient for older vehicles that are not allowed to enter the city. Please be discreet (do not leave the table or other) otherwise the neighbors will complain.

title: (08035) Barcelona - 44 Plaça del Cementiri d'Horta
description: Cemetery parking, very quiet and safe, during the day it is busy having the funeral home next door.

title: (08907) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - 84a Avinguda Mare de Déu de Bellvitge
title_short: (08907) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - 84a Avinguda Mare de Déu de Bellvitge
description: LAUNDRY SELF-SERVICE "FAST LAUNDRY". Washers and dryers.

address.street: 84a Avinguda Mare de Déu de Bellvitge

title: (08035) Barcelona - 47 Carretera de Vallvidrera al Tibidabo
title_short: (08035) Barcelona - 47 Carretera de Vallvidrera al Tibidabo
description: Several car parks along the road, slightly sloping, it is on the left while going up, towards the middle you will have the unobstructed view on Barcelona. Quiet place with some car passages. There is a lot of passage during the day, risk of low flight. Nearest parking to visit the Temple of the Sacred Heart of Jesus

title: (08030) Barcelona - 46 Carrer de Ferran Junoy
description: Day parking in a free shopping center. Torres i bages metro nearby. Open from 08:30 to 00:30.

title: (08035) Barcelona - Camí de Can Borni
description: Super quiet place and unique views, flat. Surrounded by nature. By day they park to go to Tibidabo. To the side there is also a private parking. . Site for 10 motorhomes there is water at 600metros

title: (08907) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - 9 Avinguda Mare de Déu de Bellvitge
title_short: (08907) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - 9 Avinguda Mare de Déu de Bellvitge
description: Parking area within Barcelona, ​​​​to spend the day and even sleep a quiet night. It has a bus and metro line and local shops. attention remains within the low carbon zone (zbe)

address.street: 9 Avinguda Mare de Déu de Bellvitge

title: (08035) Barcelona - 10I Vial Camino
description: Good parking spot for day and night on dead end street. Playground for kids and watertaps within 3min walk.

title: (08907) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - 328 Avinguda Mare de Déu de Bellvitge
title_short: (08907) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - 328 Avinguda Mare de Déu de Bellvitge
description: Quiet place to park 5 min from metro station. In an industrial zone. Lots of space on a weekend, maybe not during the week. In any case no passage during the weekend

address.street: 328 Avinguda Mare de Déu de Bellvitge

title: (08907) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - 56 Travessia Industrial
description: Parking for cars and trucks. We stood here for 3 days without any problems. The center of Barcelona is around 10 km away.

title: (08030) Barcelona - Carrer de Potosí
description: Large free car park. Very close to public toilets (in the gas station / Carrefour). Close to Metro stop Torres i Bages which goes directly to Arc de Triomf. No place to shower (unless you have one in your van/solar shower). WiFi in the shopping plaza opposite the carpark can be picked up from the spaces closest to the road.

title: (08960) Barcelona - BV-1468
description: Parking at a point of view, quiet in the day and shaded.

title: (08035) Barcelona - 117 Carretera Horta a Cerdanyola
description: Orchard viewpoint. Something closer than the following and in my opinion with better views. In Covidien times at 10pm there was no one but when I arrived I found several cars with youth partying.

title: (08042) Barcelona - Ronda de la Guineueta Vella, 59
title_short: (08042) Barcelona - Ronda de la Guineueta Vella, 59
description:
Here we found 3 parkings. Better to use the 1. Quite flat and asphalted. A lot of car movement! A neighbor parks his car years ago and told me there are no problems. The entrance is easy. The Canyelles L3 metro is 10 minutes away.
Recall that motorhomes are prohibited in Barcelona
No shade, no services

title: (08035) Barcelona -
description: Surrounded by nature, drinking water

title: (08017) Barcelona -
description: Drinking water point

title: (08035) Barcelona - 97 Camí de Sant Cugat
description: Drinking water point at the start of the hiking trail

title: (08901) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - 245 Avinguda de Josep Tarradellas i Joan
title_short: (08901) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - 245 Avinguda de Josep Tarradellas i Joan
description: Laundromat on the Boulevard opposite Mercadona

address.street: 245 Avinguda de Josep Tarradellas i Joan

title: (08960) Esplugues de Llobregat - Plaça de Mireia
title_short: (08960) Esplugues de Llobregat - Plaça de Mireia
description: Picnic area with a beautiful view. Drinking water fountain behind the café. Hiking trail with a city view. To be recommended as a place to sleep. Flat parking spaces available in the roundabout. Police drove past at night but left us in peace.

title: (08035) Barcelona - 230I Carretera de l' Arrabassada
description: Quiet, nice and shady. next to a shelter.

title: (08030) Barcelona - 149 Passeig de Torras i Bages
title_short: (08030) Barcelona - 149 Passeig de Torras i Bages
description: Parking near a metro station. Seems safe during the day.

title: (08042) Barcelona - 1X Carrer de les Torres
description: Parking near trinitat nova Station that takes you straight into the city centre in roughly 25minutes. Very busy and car spaces are close together. Be cautious of this. I advice arriving in the morning before the masses arrive

title: (08017) Barcelona - Carretera de l'Església

title: (08196) Sant Cugat del Vallès - Unnamed Road
title_short: (08196) Sant Cugat del Vallès - Unnamed Road
description: Very tight spot for 1 4x4, small patch out of the way and off the road, under a large pylon (it's silent) ideal for a last minute stop.

title_short: (08035) Barcelona - Carretera BV-1415 (carretera de Horta a Cerdanyola)
description: Known as Montbau viewpoint, it is an area to rest with plenty of tables and good views of Barcelona. There is no water (as far as I know). It is accessed from the road easily visible. Plenty of room to park and easy to maneuver. The parking there is a bit of shade

address.street: Carretera BV-1415 (carretera de Horta a Cerdanyola)

title: (08017) Barcelona - Carrer dels Reis Catolics
description: Parking in front of a natural park. Sloping but very quiet .. few cars that reach the bins nearby. metro to Barcelona 10 minutes walk through the natural park. the stop is baixador de vallvidrera. the metro in about 15 minutes arrives in the center of Barcelona.

title: (08196) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 28 Carrer Llentiscle
title_short: (08196) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 28 Carrer Llentiscle
description: Nice place for those who want to visit Barcelona. Quiet, some cars start circulating around 07:00. No services nearby.

title: (08198) - 58 Barri Sant Medi
description: Quiet place, natural park, camping and night prohibited. Many stops on this road where you can park. No cars passing.

title: (08017) Barcelona - 25B Camí del Pantà
description: Large parking near houses and next to the lake. Quiet, small bar next door. Water point at the bottom of the tank. Narrow access for car and van, one lane, difficult crossing.

title: (08040) Barcelona - 27 Carrer Major
description: Repsol LPG and water paying for 5 minutes from the tap.

title: (08918) Badalona -
description: Several free places along the boulevard around the tram, passing and lively. advantages: outside the ZBE and on the direct metro to the city center. Possibility to park in the adjacent quieter streets for the night. Garbage cans and shops.

No water, but there are plenty of fountains in the city. Be careful when traveling in the city, the pound is almost immediate for the French who do not pay the parking meter.

There is no sign prohibiting the night. From the car park you can enter the Collserola mountain, several kilometers to cover on foot or by car. Nearby is the Vallvidrera reservoir.

Hiking / cycling (popular cycle path, coveted jogging track on gravel / concrete, picnic at the table or river meadow, garbage bin, space for 20 to 30 cars.

description: Calle de la tv3 free parking area in front of the other parking lot of the conatas building, this has no GALIBO problems and is free, many residents of the area park their campers and AC's there since it is a quiet area.

title: (08917) Badalona - 49 Travessera de Montigalà
description: It is a quiet parking lot next to a very large park where you can relax, take dogs out, take children out to play and walk around the area a bit

title: (08970) Sant Joan Despí -
description: Not free parking with height galibo, just behind the conatas office buildings, tv3 area, galibo beware of the height of the bridge !!! 2 min away is the municipal swimming pool of sant joan despí tv3 and the tennis courts, 5 minutes from the moises broggi hospital. Ideal to go with dogs, since you are parked in a great park. Just 30 meters away there is a drinking fountain, next to the orchards and joan perich school. Negative point. From time to time there are kids making a bottle, and during the week it is a green zone for residents of the area.

title: (08970) Sant Joan Despí - 8 Carrer de la Fontsanta

description: Calle de la fontsanta, they park campers of people who live nearby, in the section between calle gran captain and mare de deu de montserrat (near the cemetery) you have a water source, 2 min walk through the park you will find the beach bar, and next to to him, the picnic by the pool, but you can also opt for the option of the bars on av. barcelona or the great captain walk.

title: (08917) Badalona - 20029 Carrer de Luxemburg
description: We have an 8 meter motorhome so it wouldn’t fit in the IKEA/decathlon car parks. But we parked in the road in front of IKEA entrance. Roads around IKEA also had lorries overnight parked. But felt safe leaving motorhome in front of IKEA entrance with security guard. Used toilets and ate in IKEA. 1euro pancakes = Cheap breakfast! Stayed 1 night.

title: (08970) Sant Joan Despí - 33 Avinguda de la Mare de Déu de Montserrat
title_short: (08970) Sant Joan Despí - 33 Avinguda de la Mare de Déu de Montserrat

address.street: 33 Avinguda de la Mare de Déu de Montserrat

Parking lot at the beginning/end of the runway where the planes fly over you so close you can touch them.
Although a bit noisy, you can go for wonderful walks here.

title: (08940) Cornellá de Llobregat - 610 A-2

title: (08917) Badalona - 7 Carrer de la Ciència
description: Just a simple car park that is free for day & overnight. We stayed for 3 nights with no problem and was a 15 min walk to Badalona metro station (gets you into Barcelona). Probably only suitable for smaller motor homes or vans and advisable to only park if there are an abundance of spaces (there seemingly usually is) as the residents of the buildings nearby use it

title: (08917) Badalona - 8 Carrer de la Filosofia
description: Lidl car park. We slept one night and everything was fine. Flat and quiet area. (Tip for those who want to go and see Barcelona later: leave the vehicle at IKEA and move by public transport. Guarded, safe parking near the bus stop. Parking height 2.10 m (ok for VW T6)

title: (08970) Sant Joan Despí - 5 Carrer de Torreblanca
title_short: (08970) Sant Joan Despí - 5 Carrer de Torreblanca
description: Free parking. Wc inside a parquet with closing hours. I have slept several nights and during the day it is full of local people, but at night there is usually space. It's quiet. Freepark. WC inside during park hours. I had slept several times and is quite. During day time it is full. Not at night.

title: (08198) Sant Cugat del Vallès - Turó del Fumet
title_short: (08198) Sant Cugat del Vallès - Turó del Fumet
description:
Superb spot to sleep peacefully and safely.
Located at the end of a path (dead end) on the heights of the Park Collserola in the middle of a forest of oaks and pines. Flat area, easy access for camper or van without height limitation with the possibility of maneuvering and parking at night and day. This is the ideal place to visit Barcelona, just go down to the village of Floresta, located 2 km away with free parking and use the inter-quoted train (FGC) that drops you off in just 15 minutes. Catalonia (terminus) in the center of Barcelona and without change of train, ditto for the return!
Ideal both for discovering or going out on Barcelona which makes the availability of trains.

title: (08960) Sant Just Desvern - 16 Carrer de Rosa Luxemburg
title_short: (08960) Sant Just Desvern - 16 Carrer de Rosa Luxemburg
description: Well leveled parking area. Next to a park with playgrounds, tables and a fountain. In the same street there is a bakery, a restaurant with a cheap daily menu and an ice cream parlor with delicious ice creams. In the same street, a bus that takes you to Barcelona in 25 minutes or a train that connects with the metro in a 12-minute walk.

title: (08198) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 13 Carrer Adrià Pardos
title_short: (08198) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 13 Carrer Adrià Pardos
description: Half-turn zone of residents, a lamppost but it's quiet and perfect for a night near Barcelona!

title: (08198) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 303 Carrer Vallvidrera a Sant Cugat
title_short: (08198) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 303 Carrer Vallvidrera a Sant Cugat

description: Ideal place to sleep, plenty of parking (in front of the park there is a shaded parking area ideal for summer) with drinking water, picnic tables, public toilets. Near the beach. A little traffic but not annoying.

title: (08970) Sant Joan Despí - 3 Carrer de José Agustín Goytisolo
title_short: (08970) Sant Joan Despí - 3 Carrer de José Agustín Goytisolo

There are also some underground type containers (odors) in the same parking lot and a mechanical workshop can help you if you have a problem, it is called SJD workshop (Jordi) very friendly and good person.

title: (08970) Sant Joan Despí - 62 Carrer Major
description: Bugaderia autoservei laundry, the man is super friendly, he has 25L cans, every week he throws out some cans. He will give them to you, if you need them, he is a very nice person.

title_short: (08980) Sant Feliu de Llobregat - 100 Riera de la Salut
description: At night it is quiet. For the day, yes, it's a good day, it fills up to burst due to the Restaurant and BBQ area there are.

title_short: (08970) Sant Joan Despí - 4 Carrer de José Agustín Goytisolo

title_short: (08970) Sant Joan Despí - 2 Carrer Maria Tarrida

title_short: (08980) Sant Feliu de Llobregat - 13 Carrer de Josep Tarradellas

Right at the main entrance of the FCB Joan Gamper sports city, during the day it is an area with a lot of traffic, especially during the week. If you are a FCB fan you will be able to see the players. You have an ALDI supermarket right there. About 500 meters away there is also a truck washing center called MUXU, they also wash AC's and bulky vehicles.

There is also a restaurant.

title_short: (08198) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 29 Avinguda de l'Estació

title_short: (08980) Sant Feliu de Llobregat - 57 Carrer de Sant Josep

title_short: (08198) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 59 Avinguda Verge de Montserrat
description: A place in La Floresta. Down a highway so there is a bit of traffic noise, but it is quiet at night. There is a supermarket and 2 bars 100 meters away. Les Escales restaurant is really good, great food and great atmosphere. It is also a bakery. Then in the opposite direction, a 10 minute walk to the train station and the main square, which has a nice Sunday market.

title: (08830) Sant Boi de Llobregat - 4 Carrer dels Feixars

title_short: (08390) Montgat - 51 Carrer Riera de Sant Jordi

title: (08820) El Prat de Llobregat - Unnamed Road
title_short: (08820) El Prat de Llobregat - Unnamed Road
description: Free and unlimited parking high above the beach at El Prat de Llobregat (paying during the day during the summer months. The price is per hour). Conservation areas adjacent to the marina and protected from the delta. Chlorine is added to the water at the tap.

title: (08110) Montcada i Reixac - 6 Carrer Lleida
description: LA COLADA self-service laundry. Very clean and spacious space, 5 washers and 3 dryers. Seats to sit, table to fold and basket to transport clothes. It has a money exchange machine since the machines work with coins. Trash cans and air conditioning in summer, a very positive point. There is plenty of parking nearby under the freeway with no height limit. Right in front there are garbage containers. In the immediate vicinity there is a fountain, bakeries, supermarkets and parks.

title: (08916) Badalona - 21 Carretera de Can Ruti
description: Family park with possibility of doing a barbecue, free parking open from 7am to 20:30, very quiet nature

title: (08830) Sant Boi de Llobregat - 10 Carrer de Frederic Mompou
title_short: (08830) Sant Boi de Llobregat - 10 Carrer de Frederic Mompou
description:
Laundromat
freewifi

title: (08390) Montgat - Av. Unió, 60
description: Large sand parking without services very quiet at night and a little busier during the day along areas of municipal sports equipment, institute, library, soccer field and cemetery enjoys privileged views of the coast of Barcelona

title: (08690) La Colònia Güell - unamed road
description: Lovely little quiet car park. Ideal for 1 night. Local bar serving chilled beer. Access to toilets. Recommended.

title_short: (08830) Sant Boi de Llobregat - 43 Carrer Riera Basté
description: Parking de la Muntanyeta, a camper fits in many places. It is usually full of cars. Next to a police station.
